chapter.name: bach Tutorial 19: Filter Filter Little Star
chapter.header: bach Tutorial 19: Filter Filter Little Star
chapter.subhead: Meet the filter and dynfilter slots
chapter.body: In this tutorial you'll get accustomed to the filter and dynfilter types of slot, and you'll learn how to make them communicate with the standard dsp Max objects.

seealsolist.seealso: Display and edit a score in proportional notation
